item.title: Why is cross entropy used for the objective function of classification problems?
item.description: # What is a classification problem The classification problem is to classify data into several categories and is one of the typical methods of machine learning. Let’s take a purchasing site as an example. Predict whether a user will buy or not buy a new product based on the user’s purchasing information. Classification into two categories (classes) is called binary classification. Classification predictions with more than two classes are called multiclass classifications.
